title: Cameroon crackdown sparks talk of war
text:
Cameroon crackdown sparks talk of war Friday, February 09, 2018 - 01:43 
Accounts of the military tactics used in trying to quell a growing secessionist movement to split Cameroon's English-speaking minority from Yaounde has shed new light on the fast-deteriorating security situation in the Anglophone part of the country.   
Accounts of the military tactics used in trying to quell a growing secessionist movement to split Cameroon's English-speaking minority from Yaounde has shed new light on the fast-deteriorating security situation in the Anglophone part of the country.  //reut.rs/2Ex8pXU
